Name: TeraBlaster
About the game: Take control of a rogue ship and and wage war against endless waves of foes in TeraBlaster! Featuring classic top-down shooter mechanics and smooth addictive gameplay, TeraBlaster will put your reflexes to the test while you hurl gamma-grenades against your foes. Explore procedurally generated environments Ruthlessly destroy hordes of enemy spacecraft Experience endless compelling gameplay Engage with the philosophical and quirky backstory Treat your ears to the gloriously retro OST TeraBlaster inspired fast-paced action roguelikes including Overture (available for purchase here!)
